trans-unit.source: Customizes the behavior of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> object with which this control adapter is associated, for specific browser requests.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasser virkemåten for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> objektet som denne kontrollen adapteren er tilknyttet for bestemte leserforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter class adapts the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser.
trans-unit.target: Klassen HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter tilpasses den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>kontroll for å endre standard markup eller virkemåten for en bestemt leser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: You can extend the HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter class to further customize rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utvide HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter klassen for å tilpasse gjengivelse av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control is bound to a data source and generates its user interface (or child control hierarchy, typically), by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde og genererer brukeren grensesnittet (eller underordnet kontrollere hierarkiet, vanligvis) av nummerering av elementene i datakilden som den er bundet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information on hierarchical data-bound controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hierarkisk databindingselementer kontroller, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Control adapters are.NET components that manage one or more stages in the life cycle of a control for a specific browser.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen adapterne are.NET komponenter som administrerer én eller flere trinn i livssyklusen til en kontroll for en bestemt leser.

trans-unit.source: Extending the HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter class provides access to the life-cycle stages of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Utvider klassen HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter gir tilgang til livssyklus faser for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [arkitektur oversikt over dynamiske virkemåten for kontrollen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: Den første forespørselen for kort gjør .NET Framework for å søke etter en tilordnet adapter for kontrollen, angitt egenskapene til ber om nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: Browser definition files are used by the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type.
trans-unit.target: Leser filer som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>klassen for å finne egenskapene til klientleseren og adapteren tilordnet av nettlesertype.</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework bygger en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: Den første forespørselen for kort gjør .NET Framework for å søke etter en tilordnet adapteren for kontrollen som er gitt egenskapene til ber om nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når kortet blir funnet, kontrollen inneholder en referanse til den tilordnede adapter-forekomsten i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en forespørselsparameter av sterk type referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> kontrollen som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Control property provides access to the corresponding control, including its properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Control gir tilgang til den tilsvarende kontrollen, inkludert egenskaper og metoder.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> associated with the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> knyttet til den gjeldende forekomsten av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Binds the data in the data source of the associated hierarchical data-bound control to the adapter.
trans-unit.target: Binding dataene i datakilden kontrollens tilknyttede hierarkisk databundet til kortet.

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method binds the data in the specified data source of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PerformDataBinding binding dataene i den angitte datakilden for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>styre til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: You can override PerformDataBinding to replace the standard data-binding functionality of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control or to provide additional data-binding functionality if the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control has been extended.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre PerformDataBinding Hvis du vil erstatte standard databinding funksjonaliteten til det tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>kontroll eller angi flere databinding funksjoner hvis den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>kontrollen er utvidet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>
